dishonored.__comment: The Dishonored System allows for dynamic location of variables. These are indicated via |#|.
dishonored.notifications.momentum.tracke: The Momentum Tracker User Role does not have permissions to Modify Configuration Settings. Please either change
dishonored.notifications.chaos.trackerPe: The Chaos Tracker User Role does not have permissions to Modify Configuration Settings. Please either change
dishonored.notifications.momentum.tracke: has permission to Modify Configuration Settings or, increase the User Role requirement for Momentum Tracker User Role in
dishonored.notifications.chaos.trackerPe: has permission to Modify Configuration Settings or, increase the User Role requirement for Chaos Tracker User Role in
dishonored.notifications.trackerPermissi: To ignore this message until next update Click Here.
dishonored.notifications.lackPermission: You do not have permission to view this item!
dishonored.notifications.tooManyBonechar: The current actor has 3 equipped bonecharms already! Doing Nothing.
dishonored.notifications.armorAlreadyEqu: The current actor has an equipped armor already! Doing Nothing.
dishonored.notifications.helmetAlreadyEq: The current actor has an equipped helmet already! Doing Nothing.
dishonored.notifications.tooManyBonechar: The current actor has 3 equipped bonecharms already! Adding as unequipped.
dishonored.notifications.armorAlreadyEqu: The current actor has an equipped armor already! Adding as unequipped.
dishonored.notifications.macroActor: Please provide an actor to the macro!
dishonored.notifications.macroSkill: Please provide an skill to the macro!
dishonored.notifications.macroStyle: Please provide an style to the macro!
dishonored.notifications.macroDiceGreate: You cannot roll more than 5 die!
dishonored.notifications.momentumLess: You can't set Momentum to a value below 0!
dishonored.notifications.momentumButtonI: You do not have sufficient permissions to change the Momentum tracker.
dishonored.notifications.NaN: The value is not a number, plus only use numeric values
dishonored.notifications.chaosLess: You can't set Chaos to a value below 0!
dishonored.notifications.chaosButtonInva: You do not have sufficient permissions to change the Chaos tracker.
dishonored.notifications.s2A: NPC with the name: |#| has been created!
dishonored.settings.hints.multipleCompli: The rulebook states "Any die which rolled 20 causes a complication". This is slightly unclear and as of Version 8 of the PDF, this is still not clear - likely due to the incredible rarity. Enabling this will allow roles to display "There were x Complications" if multiple 20s are rolled. Disabling will just state a single complication.
dishonored.settings.hints.send2ActorPerm: The contact item type has the ability to create an NPC, who should be allowed to see & use this functionality?
dishonored.settings.hints.chaosPermissio: Who should be allowed to amend the chaos tracker? Please note, the permission level MUST have the Modify Configuration Settings permission.
dishonored.settings.hints.momentumPermis: Who should be allowed to amend the momentum tracker? Please note, the permission level MUST have the Modify Configuration Settings permission.
dishonored.settings.hints.maxNumberOfExp: Max number of experience that can be given to a character. 30 is default, anything past 50 becomes almost unreadable.
dishonored.settings.hints.trackerRefresh: In seconds, how often should the tracker refresh. It is inadvisable to set this too low. Up this if it appears to be causing optimisation issues.
